post:
Hey,

Finally we started to sell KVM SSD VPS line from Hungary! So we are happy to announce we got one LET plan.  :)

    Website: https://spaceweb.eu/
    KVM SSD: https://spaceweb.eu/evo-kvm-ssd.html
    Order Link: https://spaceweb.eu/online/
    Benchmark: https://spaceweb.eu/kvm-benchmark.txt

Datacenter: GTS Budapest (http://www.gts.hu/)

    **Plan Specs:**
    Built-in control panel
    KVM
    1 CPU Core (Xeon E5)
    512MB Dedicated Memory
    10GB SSD Disk (Samsung 840 PRO)
    Daily Backups
    All nodes connect to 1Gbps internet connection.
    100mbit Port Speed / VPS
    Unmetered Traffic 

`Order Link:  https://spaceweb.eu/online/ $7/mo`

If you got any question feel free to reply or send me a PM.
